response.overview: In late 2024, Northern Irish director and writer Mark Cousins visited Shanghai. Wandering the streets of the sprawling Chinese city, his movements and meditations evolve in front of the camera. Searching for moments of ecstasy in the energy that rises around him, the city of Shanghai gives way to reflections on Cousins’ life, work, and natural rhythms – revealing a relentless workaholic, who films something everywhere he goes, and sleeps just four to five hours a night...
response.title: Dear Mark Cousins,
